clauses:
Versatile Full Stack Developer with a proven track record
in developing robust and scalable applications using a
diverse technology stack. Demonstrated expertise in
delivering exceptional results and implementing
innovative solutions.

timeline.title: Full-stack developer
tasks: Implementing and testing XD based designs with angular.
Implementing and testing web component with Reactjs.
Configuring load balancer and Autoscaling groups in AWS.
Implementing API endpoints.
Developing Lamba Functions.
Leveraging AWS SQS and AWS SNS for microservices communication.
Deploying docker containers on AWS Fargate.
timeline.description: Contributed to the growth of the company as a full-stack developer, contributing to the realization of client's web apps

timeline.title: Full-stack developer
tasks: Designing & Implementing web applications with React.
Developing CD/CI pipelines with Azure.
Implementing unit and integration tests of Azure functions.
Database migration.
timeline.description: Contributed to the growth of the company as a full-stack developer, contributing to the realization of client's web apps

timeline.title: Software developer
tasks: Developing and improving CD/CI pipelines on Gitlab.
Building a networking visualization web app for SDN networks interconnection simulation.
Migrating projects from Maven to Gradle.
Implementing unit tests and integration tests.
Developing graph visualization support for vaadin E-charts extension.

timeline.title: Code maintainer ~~ coala.io
tasks: Developing plugins for linting libraries (called coala-bears; more than 20 developed)
Unifying analysis configuration accross all supported linting tools.
Implementing unit tests. Reviewing and documenting code.
Integrating coala to CD/CI pipelines.
Implementing aspect based static code analysis.
timeline.description: Contributed to the extension of the open-source project coala.io, through the google summer of code program.

timeline.title: MSc. Web and Data Science ~~ University of Koblenz Landau
timeline.description: At the University of Koblenz Landau (Germany).

timeline.title: BSc. Computer Science ~~ University of Buea
timeline.description: Completed a bachelor in computer science at the University of Buea (Cameroon).
